summary: A respected doctor becomes the prime suspect in a series of gruesome murders.
cast: Mickey Hargitay|Rita Calderoni|Raul Lovecchio|Carmen Young|Christa Barrymore|Tano Cimarosa|Marcello Bonini Olas|Katia Cardinali|William Darni|Max Dorian|Stefania Fassio|Stefano Oppedisano|Cristina Perrier
title: Delirio caldo
